package test4_1;

class rectangl{
	int x1;
	int x2;
	int y1;
	int y2;
	public rectangl(int i, int j, int k, int l) {
		// TODO Auto-generated constructor stub
	}
	public void set(int x1, int x2, int y1, int y2) {
		//좌표설정
	}
	public boolean check() {
		return ((x1<=x2)||(y1>=y2));
	}
	public int getArea() {
		int a;
		int b;
		int weight;
		if(check()==true)
		{	a=x2-x1;
			b=y1-y2;
			weight = a*b;
			return weight;
		}
		else 
			return 0;
			
	}
	public void show() {
		
		if(check()==true) {
			getArea();
			System.out.printf("왼쪽상단 :(%d,%d)\n"+x1+y1);
			System.out.printf("왼쪽하단 :(%d,%d)\n"+x1+y2);
			System.out.printf("오른쪽상단 :(%d,%d)\n"+x2+y1);
			System.out.printf("오른쪽상단 :(%d,%d)\n"+x2+y2);
			System.out.printf("직사각형의 넓이는 \n"+getArea());
		}
		else {
			System.out.print("직사각형 출력불가");
		}
		

	}
	public boolean equals(rectangl r) {
		rectangl s = new rectangl( );
		return s==r;
	}
	
}

public class rectangle {
	
	public static void main(String args[])
	{
		rectangl r = new rectangl(0, 0, 0, 0);
		rectangl s = new rectangl(1,1,2,3);
		
		r.show();
		s.show();
		System.out.println(s.getArea());
		r.set(2,1,4,5);
		r.show();
		System.out.println(r.getArea());
		if(r.equals(s))
			System.out.println("두 사각형은 같습니다.");
	}

	
}
